FuncDef: This command makes an explicit association between a forwarding class and an LSP. The LSP name must exist and must have been associated with this SDP using the command config>service>sdp>lsp. Multiple forwarding classes can be associated with the same LSP. However, a forwarding class can only be associated with a single LSP in a given SDP. All subclasses will be assigned to the same LSP as the parent forwarding class.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the RSVP or static LSP to use to forward service packets which are classified into the specified forwarding class.
Specifies a forwarding class to LSP mapping. Values-be, l2, af, 1, h2, ef, h1, nc.
